heading: Cultural pluralism.
general-note: Here are entered works on the condition in which numerous distinct ethnic, religious, or cultural groups coexist within one society. Works on policies or programs that foster the preservation of different cultural identities, including customs, languages, and beliefs, within a unified society such as a state or nation, are entered under. Multiculturalism.. Works on the blending of elements from two or more cultures, often producing a distinctive successor culture, are entered under. Cultural fusion..
